member.name: T:BotDontLie.Common.Helpers.ArrayExtensions
member.summary: This class is being used for an extension method on the Array class called SubArray.

member.name: M:BotDontLie.Common.Helpers.ArrayExtensions.SubArray``1(``0[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that will generate a sub array given an index, and the length of the selection.
member.typeparam: The generic type, which would be the type of the array.
member.param: The starting point of the sub array extraction.
The length of the sub array.
member.returns: An array which is the subarray of a generic type.
